benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/customFields - Add custom fields to bundle

covered: Post Valid Payload scenarios: TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC19 cover successful creation with valid payloads and headers.
Invalid Payload and validation tests: TC08 (malformed JSON), TC09 (empty body), TC10 (invalid schema), TC12 (unsupported fields), TC18 (empty array) cover invalid payload scenarios and schema checks.
Header and authentication coverage: TC07 (missing X-Killbill-CreatedBy header) and TC14 (unauthorized access) are tested.
BundleId handling: TC05 (invalid UUID format) and TC06 (non-existent bundle) cover ID format and existence checks.
Edge cases: TC13 (extra query parameters) and TC19 (partial input with missing optional headers) covered.
Large payloads and performance: TC17 (large payload) and TC22 (concurrent requests) address load and performance concerns.
Security coverage: TC23 (SQL injection) and TC24 (XSS) test payload sanitization.
Service availability: TC15 (service unavailable) and TC20 (dependent service unavailable) cover 503 scenarios.
Documentation accessibility: TC25 ensures API documentation is accessible.
Field naming checks: TC11 (duplicate field names within a request) and TC21 (field name casing) address field-name handling.
gaps: Duplicate submissions across separate requests / idempotency testing is not covered (TC11 covers duplicates within a single payload only).
Rate limiting / throttling scenarios are not tested.
Caching behavior (ETag / Cache-Control) on POST responses is not tested.
Internal server error (500) scenario is not tested (e.g., database failure).
Forbidden (403) scenarios are not explicitly tested beyond the 401 case.
TC21 ambiguity: expected outcome for field name casing is not clearly defined in acceptance criteria.
recommendations: Add idempotency tests to verify behavior for repeated POSTs (duplicate submissions across calls) or confirm true idempotency if intended.
Introduce rate-limiting/throttling tests to validate behavior under burst traffic.
Add caching-related checks for POST responses if caching is expected (ETag/Cache-Control headers).
Add a 500 Internal Server Error scenario to cover server-side failure cases (e.g., DB outage).
Include explicit 403 Forbidden tests or expand role/permission coverage beyond the 401 case.
Clarify and stabilize TC21 expected behavior for field name casing (update acceptance criteria and tests accordingly).
Expand security test coverage with additional attack patterns (more SQLi/XSS edge cases) and content variants.
